long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minimalistic highlighter for HTML-pages. Comes with multiple colors. Utilizes browser's storage to save highlights and supports dynamic pages. Built-in import/export feature. Fast and optimized.

Upcoming features:
- cross-element highlighting support
- cloud storage sync (e.g. Google account)
- responsive color palette location on the screen relative to the text size
- page-specific highlights
- automatic font color readjusting
- more optimization
